channel.title: What Percentage of Americans Vape on Stat 150 at Cal Poly
channel.description: Recent content in What Percentage of Americans Vape on Stat 150 at Cal Poly

item.title: Stats In The News: Vaping
item.description: There seems to be a perception among Americans that vaping is less harmful than tobacco products, and the article “What percentage of Americans Vape”by Zach Hrynowski from Gallup, wanted to better understand the scale of vape use in America. Click here to learn about what this poll concluded about adults use of vape in America.
